sentences.en: Balk the purpose of those who threaten us.

sentences.en: By this time the fire was beginning to threaten.
sentences.cn: 这个时候,火势已开始凶猛.

sentences.en: Even after their divorce he continued to stalk and threaten her.
sentences.cn: 即使在离婚后他仍继续纠缠和威胁她。

sentences.en: He would go to him - threaten, cajole, actually destroy him, if necessary.
sentences.cn: 他要去看他 —— 威胁 、 利诱 、 倘使需要的话, 就把他彻头彻尾地毁灭.

sentences.en: I must be careful not to tread on their toes. My job is to challenge, but not threaten them.
sentences.cn: 我必须小心谨慎，不能得罪他们。我的工作是挑战他们，而不是威胁他们。

sentences.en: If you threaten me or use any force, I shall inform the police.
sentences.cn: 你要是威胁我或是动武，我就报警。

sentences.en: Loss of confidence could trigger a run on Citibank that would threaten the entire financial system.
sentences.cn: 民众信心的丧失可能导致花旗银行出现挤兑，从而威胁到整个金融体系。

sentences.en: Postal workers are threatening a strike if they don’t receive a pay increase.
sentences.cn: 邮政工人威胁如果不加薪，他们就要罢工。

sentences.en: The newcomers directly threaten the livelihood of the established workers.
sentences.cn: 新来的工人直接威胁到老工人的饭碗。

sentences.en: The people fear not death; why threaten them with it.
sentences.cn: 民不畏死, 奈何以死惧之.

sentences.en: They threaten him with a law suit.

sentences.cn: 我们的繁衍速度太快，以至于人口数量对地球的生态系统造成了威胁。

sentences.en: Will severe selection standards create elitism and threaten the Olympic ethic of participation?
sentences.cn: 严格的选拔标准是否会造成精英主义，进而危及奥林匹克重在参与的理念呢？
